title: Brooklyn Film Festival 2025
description: The Brooklyn Film Festival runs from May 30 to June 8, 2025, featuring 145 films competing in various categories including feature narrative, documentary, short films, experimental, and animation. The festival takes place at Windmill Studios in Greenpoint and Wythe Hotel in Williamsburg, with an online option available.

title: New York City Independent Film Festival 2025
description: The New York City Independent Film Festival is scheduled for June 2 to June 8, 2025. It showcases the best in independent cinema including short films, feature films, music videos, and animated works, with panels, parties, and awards for various categories.
venue: Various venues in New York City
